sentences.en: Gnome Female - " I've discovered that getting pummeled by a blunt weapon can be quite painful. "
sentences.cn: 经我研究发现,被钝器敲打会非常疼.

sentences.en: Gnome Male - " I think that last vendor short changed me. Oh, that was a bad one. "
sentences.cn: 我觉得刚才那个卖货的坑了我的钱. 哦! 嘿嘿嘿, 他是个坏人.

sentences.en: How to switch to Console mode in GNOME?
sentences.cn: 如何在GNOME内切换到控制台模式?

sentences.en: In order to use the accessibility support for GNOME accessibility infrastructure must be enabled.
sentences.cn: 为了在GNOME中使用辅助功能,必须启用辅助功能.

sentences.en: No one with a face like hers could be a witch or a gnome!
sentences.cn: 有那样纯洁的脸的人不可能是女巫或是精灵!

sentences.en: On the front turret side is the white gnome of the Tiger company.
sentences.cn: 在炮塔侧面前方涂有该师第8装甲连的白色精灵标志.

sentences.en: Personally, I'm also wondering why there are some significant differences between GNOME and KDE.
sentences.cn: 就个人而言, 我也想知道为什么在GNOME和KDE之间有一些显著差异.

sentences.en: So far as I can judge , the GNOME Shell menus seem clumsier than the existing ones.
sentences.cn: 所以现在我认为GNOMEshell比现在的菜单愚蠢多了.

sentences.en: The GNOME desktop has been like this way too.
Welcome to Beijing GNOME User Group!
Whisper gnome base land speed is 30 feet, despite their size.
sentences.cn: 基本陆地速度为30英尺, 即使他们是小体型.

trans.tran_en: a creature in children’s stories who looks like a little old man. Gnomes have pointed hats, live under the ground, and guard gold, jewels etc.
